featured.headline: A Meta AI security researcher said an OpenClaw agent ran amok on her inbox
featured.summary: The viral X post from an AI security researcher reads like satire. But it's really a word of warning about what can go wrong when handing tasks to an AI agent....

secondary_1.headline: With AI, investor loyalty is (almost) dead: At least a dozen OpenAI VCs now also back Anthropic

secondary_2.headline: Anthropic accuses Chinese AI labs of mining Claude as US debates AI chip exports
